subtipo.formula: (((An - An2) / 2 + Al) * PV) * 2+ (An2 + Al) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(Al) * 2
((An - An2 * 2) + Al) * PV + ((An2 + Al) * PV2) * 2 + calcularTMullion(Al) * 2
(An - An2 + Al) * PV + (An2 + Al) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(Al)
(An + Al - Al2) * PV + (An + Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An)
(An + Al - Al2) * PV + (An + Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An)
(An + Al - Al2) * PV + (An + Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An)
((An / 2 + Al2) * PV) * 2 + (An + Al - Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An)
((An / 3 + Al2) * PV) * 3 + (An + Al - Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An) + calcularTMullion(Al2) * 2
(An + Al2) * PV + (An + Al - Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An)
((An / 2 + Al2) * PV) * 2 + (An + Al - Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An) + calcularTMullion(Al2)
((An / 3 + Al2) * PV) * 3 + (An + Al - Al2) * PV2 + calcularTMullion(An) + calcularTMullion(Al2) * 2
